entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
